entry.title: My New Home Lab Journey
entry.summary:
My New Home Lab Journey
Welcome to my blog where I share my journey of setting up a new home lab. This setup is a dream come true for any tech enthusiast and I’m excited to document every step of this adventure.
The Heart of the Lab: Hardware Specifications
The core of my home lab consists of three HP ProDesk 600 G4 Mini PCs.
These compact powerhouses are equipped with impressive hardware...

entry.title: Deploying a Custom Application with IntuneWinAppUtil in Microsoft Intune

link.title: Deploying a Custom Application with IntuneWinAppUtil in Microsoft Intune

entry.summary:
Deploying a Custom Application with IntuneWinAppUtil in Microsoft Intune
Deploying custom applications in Microsoft Intune can be efficiently managed using the IntuneWinAppUtil tool. This guide provides a step-by-step approach to packaging and deploying a custom application.
Prerequisites
Windows-based application (.exe, .msi, .bat, etc.) Microsoft Intune subscription IntuneWinAppUtil...

entry.title: Implementing LAPS in Microsoft Entra and Intune

link.title: Implementing LAPS in Microsoft Entra and Intune

entry.summary:
Implementing LAPS in Microsoft Entra and Intune
Essential Preparations
Before integrating LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) with Intune, verify that your Windows platform is supported:
Windows 10 version 20H2 or later, updated with the security patch from April 11, 2023 Windows 11 version 21H2 or later, also updated as of April 11, 2023 Windows Server 2019 and subseq...

link.title: Creating a Simple Flask Project - Simple Website

entry.summary:
Creating a Simple Flask Project - Hello World!
Requirements
Downloading Python is a straightforward process. You can obtain the latest version from the official Python Downloads page.
Once you’ve downloaded the Python installer, the installation process is made easy with a user-friendly wizard. If you prefer step-by-step guidance, you can refer to the official documentation on using Python ...
